Husband liked for Christmas very comfortable
Excellent product, quality, and the fit is nice and comfortable
Purchased for my Hubby to attend a wedding, ordered 3 different shirts and he liked this one the most.

sizing seems to be correct.
Good quality. Not needed after all. Still waiting on a refund almost 2-3 weeks after it was returned.
I lost too much weight but great shirt! Great color!
La calidad de la tela es muy buena, el talle corresponde con la descripción del mismo, agradable para vestir, muy conforme con la camisa.
Shirt is definitely undersized for a 3X, otherwise fair to good quality. Material is light, good summer shirt.
A wonderful shirt, fits just right. The color is excellent. I've gotten plenty of compliments while wearing it.
It was super light weight yet still not see-through. My girlfriend used it for prom and it was perfect. I definitely recommend this one.
Wrinkle control and excellent fit and feel

评论概述: Nice shirt, but inconsistent sizing.  Order one size up.
评论详情: These are nice shirts that fit well.  I ordered two different colors in XL and while one was what I would expect in a XL fit, the other color was a bit tight and fit like a Large.  There’s no cotton in these shirts so they won’t shrink.  I would recommend ordering a size up.
Wore to a wedding, for perfect and felt good!
Shirt fits like a glove. The material really works in any type of weather. Sleeves are long enough, and the shirt stays tucked in
This is one slick shirt.  Literally so smooth - feels great.  Well made.  My only complaint is that it appears to be a slim fit - and I'm a girl.  I need that hip room!  Great shirt.  Great price!

评论概述: Decent dress shirt, versatile for wear
评论详情: This shirt is typically sized to other brands from apparel shops in the United States, the small fit me alright as I expected and isn’t too tight in any areas.  The material isn’t quite wrinkle resistant, but it doesn’t wrinkle if you look at it wrong like so many dress shirts.  Overall I like the material for its soft feel while still being strong against the wear of elbows in the sleeves.  I got the light blue color and its a strong match for that classic business shirt light blue that matches with black, navy, and khaki pants.
This shirt held up for a few days but the threading eventually gave up. I used this regularly at work.

This shirt, while nice, is EXTREMELY tight around the armpits. My hubby usually fits a medium/large, so I got him a large shirt, but it was still very tight around the pits. He said it was a comfortable shirt except for that area.
This shirt is true yo size, fabric is so soft.

This shirt is ok. The fabric seems nice and it seems to be well made. It is a little shorter than I would have liked and seems to be a tad smaller than expected. Also, the color was nothing like I expected. The color I ordered said "Violet" and showed a picture of a grayish colored shirt. So I expected either a light purple or a gray/purplish shirt. What I received was a dark blue shirt. It wasn't for any special occasion and my husband said this color was fine, so I'm keeping it. But, just be aware that the color may not be at all what you expect.
Great wash and wear shirt
Got one for my husband and one for my son, they both liked the look and feel.
This is a great business casual shirt. I really like how the shirt fits, same size as other brands of dress shirts.
My husband looks very handsome in this. It fits well and has a nice color. Good stitching and seems to be well made.
great

This is a nice lightweight dress shirt. It is soft and comfortable and fits nicely. It is certainly a business "casual" shirt since the collar is not stiff enough for a tie. The color was true to the picture.

The material is thin and one of the button holes already had threads come apart and get wound around the button; for the price, I would expect a more durable and well-stitched shirt.  But it is comfortable and relatively wrinkle-free.
I like everything about product price, quality.
This was a gift for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it
I needed a shirt at the last minute so I ordered it.  It served its purpose.
The fit is perfect and the sturdiness of the fabric is amazing.  Best everyday shirt ever.

评论概述: Caution- There are 2 different size charts for each shirt
评论详情: There is a a "size chart" (click on), just below pictures of the diff shirt colors. Near the bottom of product info, there is another Coofandy size chart. Problem is that the size measurement info is different for the same shirt depending on which chart you are looking at. I picked one chart which turned out to be the wrong size. Not worth the hassle to return so I gave it charity.

This is a nice and elegant dress shirt. It's very smooth-soft. The fabric has a slight stretch. There are wrinkles from being folded but otherwise seems wrinkle-resistant. My husband is normally a large. According to the size chart, however, he could've gotten a small. To be prudent, I got a medium. This turned out to be a good fit. The color is not dark blue at all, more grey blue. See the photo of this shirt next to an actual dark blue shirt.
Like the material. Like the fit.

评论概述: Fits great, color is not as pictured
评论详情: One of the difficult parts of buying clothing online is not being certain of the color until you see it on your body in different lighting conditions.  It's really hard to get the color right in listing photos.  Unfortunately this shirt is victim to that.  Coofandy makes great clothing.  I own a dozen pieces from Coofandy and I've been converted to buying more Coofandy because it always fits great and looks great.This shirt however, is not the color as pictured in the listing.  I was hoping for a muted color like in the listing photo, but this is a much more vibrant color.  I've attached a photo taken of the shirt under sunlight and shadow.  Holding this image on my phone next to the shirt, I adjusted the color settings until it looked as close as possible to the shirt to give you a better idea of what this color actually is.  It still looks great, but I don't look good in vibrant colors.  I have a tan, so I tend to go for muted colors.  This shirt is still beautiful, it's just not for me.

This shirt is really nice. It is well-suited to wearing with a tie in a more formal environment, or open-collar in a business casual environment (where I mostly wear it). The material is of a good thickness, unlike some of the thin, cheap shirts I've gotten. I ordered Khaki, and the color is exactly as depicted in the listing. The sizing was just as expected, as well. I have come to appreciate the Coofandy brand, and have several shirts from them. I have always found them to be of a good quality and accurate sizing. I like that they are carving out a niche in the world of reasonably-priced, but good quality clothing.

This dress shirt is well made. It is very comfortable and stylish. You can dress it up or dress it down. Wear under a sweater or vest and it still looks great. The fit was true to size and the color was accurate. I washed it on a gentle cycle and dried it with no heat and it came out absolutely perfect. I highly recommend.

评论概述: Fairly good with a weak collar
评论详情: Pretty good everyday business casual shirt. The fit is about what was expected. The material is okay.  The collar is a bit flimsy and doesn't "stand up tall" as is my personal preference.

I really like this shirt it feels good on you and to me it really looks good. Now this is a dressy looking type of shirt that can be worn with a dress up look or with jeans are whatever you want for a good look either way. This dark blue color to me looks much better in person than the ad or my pictures of it look, it has a little deeper blue look that is very nice to me. This shirt can easily be worn year round. The stitching and material are really good. I have other shirts that are almost twice the price that are not as nice as this one. I only weigh 132lbs and 5ft 10in and this size fit me well, if you are meaty built you may want to size up because it is a slim fit shirt but has good stretching to flex those muscles. Yes, I do recommend this nicely made and good-looking shirt.

This is a good, lightweight dress shirt. The material feels like viscose (I just looked it up, the shirt IS viscose and poly blended).  The weave is tight and it is wrinkle free. It washed up well and did not need to be ironed.  It doesn't have the high quality look of a cotton shirt but it will do for less casual events/meetings. 5 stars
fits just right

3.5 Stars  I normally love this company. BUT This time I'm disappointed. I bought the Violet but what I got is a Dark Navy Blue. It does fit well. The sizing is good. But if this is their idea of Violet they need to look that color up. Navy Blue is NOT Violet.

It's a good collared shirt for business casual wardrobes. Goes well with a black tie, for those office dwellers out here. Not the nicest or the best looking but it does the trick. It runs small too, so order a size larger than you normally do.  Good value for the money.

评论概述: 100% solid addition to the wardrobe- dress it up or down with color!!
评论详情: In a world of needing business shirts on a daily basis.. this is a solid addition to the lineup! Mine needs x5 days a week- yet, not everyday needs a “fancier” starched and trimmed option! These are a perfect price point to add a few and swap out as it begins to look tattered. With all the various color these bring a refreshing variety and mix/match with a tie collection really well..  Fabric is more than respectable.. not too thin, feels slick and good against skin- doesn’t have that dreaded cheap sheen. Shirt cleans up with a steam press really well- I favor bc, it doesn’t take a lot of effort to care for. Can be laundered at home on cold/line dry- then, quick steam/dewrinkle cycle and have a ‘good as new’ appearance.  Has ability to be worn with/without a tie- and although stand alone collar isn’t reinforced, it still has merit to its structure. Button sleeves can be worn rolled up for casual activity and finished hem line could also tuck in/out for a casual dinner date or else- pressed, tucked, buttoned and tied up for a work day meeting!  Sizing as expected- this has a more general fit bc of xs-xl type style sizing vs. neck/body/arm numeric sizing for a tailored look. IF, between sizes I suggest going up. Mine ordered XXL and it fit better in body/sleeve length. For reference: 50yr old, 6’4”, 225lb, 36x36. Violet color is more of a grayish hue.. my only disappointment. Otherwise, great filler or everyday work shirt that serves its purpose well. Hoping info can help- stay safe everyone.

The Coofandy white dress shirt was ordered for use with suits and sweaters.The polyester / viscose / spandex blended shirt was received and immediately tried on.  When opened from the package the shirt was wrinkled, but after being washed and hung to dry it was relatively wrinkle free.  I am 5'10" tall, weigh 200 pounds, and have a 16.5 inch neck.  According to the Coofandy size chart, a Large size should have been ordered based upon my torso body size.  Also, there is no neck size chart for this shirt.  However, since I've had neck size vs body size issues with shirts ordered online in the past, an XL was ordered.  As it turned out, this was the right thing for me to do.  The collar fits me properly, and is very close to a 16.5 inch size.  The rest of the shirt also fits me a little large.  The one thing about this shirt that is displeasing is that it is short for a dress shirt, very short  It is almost like it should be worn outside the pants.  It will be worn as a dress shirt, but I will also need to watch that the shirt does not come out from the beltline.  The collar is made for a small knotted tie.  Thus, a Windsor knot or a thicker tie could not be worn with the collar on this shirt.  The sleeves are adequate for my 35 inch arms.The other comment is that my wife is of the opinion that the fabric is very thin for a dress shirt.  She indicated it was almost see-through.BOTTOM LINE:  This is an inexpensive & competively priced dress shirt that has little or no wrinkles when properly washed & dried.  This is a regular fit shirt, but the length is short for a dress shirt.  I would order the shirt again.
La tela es suave el color es tal como se ve en la foto y no se arruga mucho.
Elegant and comfortable, true to size.

评论概述: Nice shirt but measurements are off.
评论详情: Size is confusing. The chart doesnot match the information given on the model sizing, so I had to guess and orderd a medium. The shirt was too big on my son - chest 37, waist 30 shoulder 23 height 6 ft The shirt fit my husband (who usually wears a large) - Chest 41, waist 35 height 6'2"

Love this shirt so much. Awesome quality. The collars are perfect for my type of ties. I get complimented on this shirt and tie combination every time I wear it. No complaints. It doesn't feel cheap. Highly recommend.
It doesn't look like the picture at all.

评论概述: This is a Tad Smaller than Expected
评论详情: This is a well-made shirt that looks great on my husband, but it is a tad smaller than I expected it to be when I ordered it. Granted, when you order things online, you never know how the variation in sizes are going to be, but my husband is a size large, which is what I ordered, but it is just too small for him. Never fear though, he has a grandson that is a slighter body type, and it should look great on him, as well. Other than the size, the material is nice, the wrinkle-free defender should be great after a few wears, and it is a good length, but if you are borderline L to a XL, I would order a size up.

This shirt is quality-made and well-sewn.  Very comfortable, looks great, feels great.  Adjustable cuffs so it can be worn tight fitting or loose, or rolled up for that short-sleeve working man's look!  Excellent Value!

评论概述: Tal y como está en la imagen
评论详情: Exelente calidad

评论概述: It’s comical how high the shirt rides!
评论详情: It feels nice and fit around the chest, stomach, and neck but the length of the shirt my god it’s a kids shirt length. I have dress clips (u know the ones that keep ur shirt tucked by clipping on to ur knee high dress socks) and this shirt can’t even reach em u lift ur hands up and the shirt lifts up to show the nips! It’s funny yet a waste of money. I do not recommend.

Business casual.  This shirt is business casual.  My gosh the material feels so good on the body-the material is smooth and lightweight with the polyester-viscose-spandex blend.  It is not stiff nor rough.  The buttons on this grey shirt matched the color of the shirt exactly, and of course, there is an extra button.  Double stitching makes every seam smooth and secure.  The collar is not very sturdy and I am not sure if you could wear a tie with this.

This is a nice quality shirt that will work well for work/business casual use. The material feels good and isn't thin, with a nice smooth finish (not microfiber, which I don't like). It's an upgrade to what you'd typically find at discount dept stores.  It's definitely going to get some use with its versatility. The sizing is good (regular fit) and the length designed to be worn tucked in.  I wish I hadn't ordered the Cyan color, as it's identical in color to hospital scrubs (or at least that's what it reminds me of). I don't fault the manufacturer for this, as the photos of the color is accurate. This shirt is definitely a keeper and a good value for the money.

评论概述: Dress shirt fits as expected and well made… So far so good.
评论详情: This is a nice dress shirt thus far! It fits as expected and is made of quality materials. The color is great and the shirt is well made overall. It states wrinkle free, but that isn’t the case…an easy fix but wanted to make note. I will update on use and durability here and when needed.

This dress shirt has such a fancy style and comes in a variety of colors. The fit is true to the size chart. The fabric is light and breathable. It's easy to put on and gives plenty of room to move in. This shirt can be worn on any occasion. Amazing quality for the price.
My 17 year old needed a last minute dress shirt for a school dance. This worked great. Perfect fit, looked nice and was ready to go out of the package. Happy to have found it.

Nicely made, fabric feels nice, fits just right! It's so nice to find a shirt that isn't "slim fit"; not that I'm not in shape ("Pear" is a shape, right?), but for all of us "Dad Bods" out there, this doesn't strain your buttons. It has a kinda spread collar, which isn't to my tastes, but other than that, a solid value!

Very nice and comfortable shirt, pleasant fabric (not 100% cotton), size fits as expected, good quality, not too fancy so it’s suitable for daily use, sits good and the appearance is nice. Great value for the money for daily use shirt.

Im 5'9" and 180 lbs and a large fit me perfectly.Well constructed, soft and wrinkle free. Great fit and pleasing color.  Collar stiff enough for a tie but comfortable with or without.  Great as an overshirt or by itself.  Very happy with this new addition to my work rotation.

I got this shirt to wear for dressy and casual dress occasions. It fits as expected and the material has a high quality feel to it as well as the stitching on the buttons. I feel like it is a good value for the price and you won't be disappointed in the quality.

My first focus is how a shirt fits.  I’m a size XL, standing at 6 feet with a belly.  The shirt was comfortable and fit well.  The length of the shirt and sleeve length was good just as advertised.I really like the light green for a change of pace.  The material feels comfortable and smooth.  Well-tailored, good for business meetings and casual dress.When washed shirt came out of the washer and dryer without the need to use an iron.

评论概述: Great look, comfortable and stretchy fabric
评论详情: I am not an "athletic cut" but can usually get a 2XL shirt to fit over my belly bulge.  I ordered a 3XL in this shirt because, well the Chinese seem to not understand American sizes.  I am glad I did.  It fits almost exactly like the 2XL shirts I buy in the department stores.  Other than the size issue, it looks nice, feels good and stretches where it should.  I don't feel like I'm in a straight jacket when I wear this, so that's a win in my book.

I wanted to add a new dress shirt to the lineup for work and ordered this one.  BAsed on the size chart I ordered a size L.  It fits about a 17-17.5 x 34 and fits nicely for my frame.  The fabric is comfortable and more akin to a nicer dress shirt vice the cheaper polyester shirts.  I really liked the light gray color which looks great.  It was wrinkled in the package but a quick ironing fixed it.  I don't think it's fully wrinkle free after wash either.  I didn't really like the collar which is kind of flimsy.  it doesn't have the collar points in it to keep the tips stiff and the collar itself didn't really have stiffness to it.  I seemed to work fine during the day but it also wasn't the sharpest looking.  Shirt could also work well as a business casual shirt without a necktie.

While I like this dress shirt, I was a little surprised at how much thicker the material is compared to other dress shirts. This shirt is similar to a "beach" shirt in its thickness/ heavy weight. That being said, I like how the shirt fits (comfortably). It is constructed very well, no issues with the stitching, and it fits as expected. Worth the money, and highly recommended.

I got this shirt in a green and extra large as I measure 50 1/2" on my chest. The shirt is a good fit despite that I ordered the XL and measures 51.3 inches, an inch bigger. The shirt still fits well when I am seated.  The material is soft and comparable to other high-end shirts. I did like that it has a front pocket and the stitching is well-done as there were really no loose strings on the shirt. I've been wearing this to work and I really like the pop of color that it has. The shirt stands up well to a washer and does not shrink. I highly recommend this brand of dress shirts. The neck is wide enough to be able to use with a tie.

评论概述: My husband really likes these shirts
评论详情: COOFANDY Men's Long Sleeve Dress Shirts Wrinkle-Free Button Down Business Casual Shirts  My husband has amassed a small collection of these COOFANDY shirts by now. He loves them for the fit and color options. I love that they wash and dry beautifully and don't need ironing as long as you take them out of the dryer promptly! The fit is true and the cut is flattering. The sage green is really sharp looking.
Fits well. The fabric might be a little heavy on a hot day, but perfect for an office environment.
The color of this shirt is great, and the feel and fit are even better. There is some stretch to the shirt which makes it nice when sitting. The sleeves are the perfect length as is the whole shirt.

The website says "regular fit" but it fits like a "slim fit", by which I mean that, while the Large has a chest of 48+ and my chest is 47+, and it fits up there, the body is tight from the ribcage down. It says the large has a waist of 45, and my waist is 40, so it SHOULD be loose, but it's not. In all fairness, I have to say that the Amazon Size-Bot said "X-Large will fit you best based on millions of customer orders, returns, and reviews.", but I ignored it because the numbers looked like the Large would work -- I should have listened to to the Size-Bot! Actually, the rest of the shirt (size aside) is FANTASTIC! Soft, silky fabric with a combination of polyester, Viscose (I found out that "Viscose" is basically re-cycled Rayon), and a touch of spandex -- it has just a touch of stretch to it, which will make the Large work (barely, but especially if I wear a tie to cover the buttons which are pulled tight by my body) -- and I'm glad, because I really like the shirt. The size of the shoulders, sleeve length, and even the neck is all good for me -- it's just the lower chest and belly that is snug! The light green color is a perfect match for both my black suit and my multi-color brown suit jacket. COOFANDY makes some good clothes, and this is no exception! If it actually fit like a "regular fit", I'd definitely give it a full five stars, but because of the snugness of the torso, I've gone with 4 stars.

评论概述: Terrific shirt. Looks and feels great.
评论详情: This shirt looks very attractive and well made. It also had a comfortable feel to it in size and texture on the skin.

Great looking shirt! I loved the fit and material. Material was very cool feeling, slightly silky and non transparent without being weighted. Not totally wrinkle free but didn’t get too wrinkled with wear and storage.  My husband is 6’ tall and 235 lbs and the large was the right size. It was a a tad short on the sleeves and a little short on the torso if he lifted his arms. However an XL would have been too baggy on him. Happy with the shirt and would recommend.

One of the first things I noticed about this shirt is that when I opened the package the shirt color (light green) matched the color of the website. I mean I've gotten some items that weren't even close to the color on the website but this one was a good match. I hope they keep it up.  I normally wear XL dress shirts (6'2" with a bit of a belly). I ordered an XL and it fit fine. Even the sleeve length was good. Lots of times I feel the sleeves are too short, again this shirt was fine.  It's a seven button shirt (including the neck button) and it's long enough to stay tucked in. If it was an option I'd get an 8 button, longer, shirt but this one works.  After washing and drying (and not leaving it sit in the dry long after it was done) the shirt wasn't wrinkled, no ironing was needed. The material and construction seems to have taken the washing with no issues.

评论概述: Feels Soft and Collar Holds Shape
评论详情: This shirt has a nice soft feel to it.  The collar holds it's shape and it really is wrinkle free.  I got this dress shirt for my husband.  He wears a size large and It fits him just as expected.  He says it is very comfortable.
Nice quality men's shirt, material is a cooling feel and is not very wrinkly.

The description says wrinkle free and that's definitely a stretch although it's not terribly wrinkled it will still need to be ironed. It is also a slinky type material which is a little strange for a dress shirt. It also sits very small so size up.

评论概述: Great shirt for a good price
评论详情: Can you get a nice dress shirt for under $30?  Yes you can!This shirt is more of a cotton blend than some silk shirt, but it looks like it costs much more than it does.  It is suitable as part of a dressy ensemble. The fit is what I expected and it feels nice.  I have bought some shirts that have made me feel a bit itchy, but not this one.  I am pleased with it and will be wearing it to work on the regular.

Pros: Great fit. Nice and smooth material. Very good design.  Cons: IT is not wrinkle-free but wrinkle resistant. You will need to iron this shirt but not as bad as others.  Other thoughts: Very happy with this shirt, I was able to wear it in the office without any issues.

The color is as pictured and the material feels light and silky. The fit is a little large but its a solid basic dress shirt! I wouldn't wear it to a wedding or a very special occasion as it has a more relaxed look to it but its great as office attire!

This dress shirt fits as expected. The texture has a cotteny feel and not a silk feel but feels soft. I do not feel uncomfortable wearing this and can not feel a texture which some shirts has that can annoy you. This is a nice dress shirt and fits well with my suits.
I like the color and button down collar. It fit is regular and true to the size. It will be perfect for my Dad.

This is a good men’s long sleeve shirt that can be used in all occasions as is and with blazer and/or tie. The material is ok but the wrinkle free description doesn’t match with the actual product we received. But once you washed and iron, it has this sharp appearance effect on man wearing it. My husband is not used to  wearing long sleeve shirt but he liked this one. We may try different color!
More like HUGE, I am a medium in most shirts and this was ridiculously oversized.

I got the shirt for my boyfriend, whose mother passed from breast, cancer. He's never had a pink type shirt and this is very nice. The material is soft and it's not a loud pink. He looks amazing in it.

I’m very pleased with the shirt and the quality is good so if you’re looking for a dress type shirt that you can wear to work every day, this is a great choice. The only complaint would be that the fit is a little bit more modern than classic so it’s a little bit of a tighter fit around the torso. So if you have an extra pound or two on you, it will be a bit tight around the midsection if they just added a centimetre in diameter to the fit from the midpoint down, I think this shirt would get five out of five.
